titles.title: Community Safety Initiative Act of 2008
To authorize funds to the Local Initiatives Support Corporation to carry out its Community Safety Initiative.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
9/15/2008--Introduced.
Community Safety Initiative Act of 2008 - Authorizes the Assistant Attorney General for the Office of Justice Programs to make grants in FY2009-FY2014 to the Local Initiatives Support Corporation to carry out its Community Safety Initiative.
